author: wsjcom
title: Trump Doesn’t Need Advice on Negotiating With Kim Jong Un
text:
I find it hard to believe that Robert Zoellick thinks that President Trump needs a refresher course in negotiating when he knows full well that Mr. Trump literally wrote the book (“10 Tips for Negotiating With Kim Jong Un,” op-ed, March 28).
It’s been my experience and observation that keeping one’s opponent off balance is a primary tactic in negotiating. It seems to me that we have proof of North Korea’s vertigo given that Kim Jong Un visited Beijing on March 26. The relationship between Pyongyang and Beijing is no lovefest....
